item.title: Large pothole on Hales Road at junction with The Grove, 18th July
item.description:
There's a large pothole on Hales Road at the junction with The Grove. It's formed either next to a repair or is where a previous repair has failed.

item.title: Very worn road markings, 18th July
item.description:
Colletts Drive, from junction with Tewkesbury Road through to mini roundabout (entrance to Tesco car park). Road markings very worn, especially at junction into Tesco filling station. Full re-marking needed along this whole stretch of road - white lines and also yellow lines.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colletts Drive, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Tree overhanging hedge causing damage, 18th July
item.description:
This tree is blocking late afternoon sunlight to our garden to be able to use our pool. It’s also blocking light to our hedge, so has killed a large area of this. We’ve tried regrowing two conifers to fill the gap but they don’t get enough light to survive & we now have a large gab in our hedge on the Old Bath Road side. We don’t want this tree to get any bigger, causing more damage to our hedge & further blocking the sunshine into our garden. We are happy to pay for any work ourselves to reduce the size of this tree as I understand this is not something the Highways would pay for?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
